meanings.definition: A retinoid used topically to treat acne and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
meanings.sent1: She applied tretinoin to her face every night to help with her acne.
meanings.sent2: The dermatologist recommended tretinoin for her skin concerns.
meanings.sent3: After using tretinoin, her skin felt like it was getting a magical makeover.
meanings.sent4: Tretinoin was like a superhero fighting against acne and wrinkles on her skin.
meanings.sent5: The effects of tretinoin on her complexion were truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: To apply tretinoin cream to the affected area.
meanings.sent1: She carefully tretinoined her cheeks before bedtime as instructed.
meanings.sent2: Remember to tretinoin your skin gently to avoid irritation.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he could tretinoin his way to a flawless complexion.
meanings.sent4: She tretinoined her face like an artist painting a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The way she tretinoined her skin showed her dedication to skincare.
